Special Events in DFW

← Back to Venues About

Explore special events happening around Dallas-Fort Worth!

Upcoming Events

Jazz at the Museum

Jazz at the Museum is a recurring jazz concert series running from August 23, 2025 through April 25, 2026. DMA fills its halls with the soulfoul sounds of live jazz every other month, featuring talented local bands. These events bring the halls of the DMA to life with live jazz bands in a lounge-inspired setting—complete with a full bar, light bites, and access to select exhibitions. Extras: Access to exhibitions, VIP dining options Pricing: $36 to $140; member discounts available

Venue: Dallas Museum of Art, 1717 N. Harwood St., Dallas, TX
City: Dallas
Area: Arts District

2025-08-23 | 6-9pm

More Info

Riverfront Jazz Festival

Dates: August 29–31, 2025 (Labor Day Weekend) Format: Indoor music stages featuring jazz, blues, R&B, soul, neo-soul; outdoor food trucks and vendor area Special Feature: Showcase for Dallas–Fort Worth’s young, rising musical talent

Venue: Fair Park, 3800 Parry Ave, Dallas, TX 75226
City: Dallas
Area: South

2025-08-29

More Info

Vitruvian Salsa Festival (Salsa in the Park)

Free and family-friendly! Enjoy live Latin music, salsa lessons around 6:30 PM, DJs, food trucks, and vendors offering a festive atmosphere. When? Every 2nd Saturday in June, July, August, and September, from 6:00 PM to 10:00 PM. 2025 Lineup Highlights: June 14: Havana NRG (Latin orchestra) July 12: Latin Swing August 9: Zone D’Mambo September 13: Yamilka G & Orquesta Parking: Free general parking at Vitruvian Park’s Bella Lane and Ponte Avenue lots. Additional lot available at Alfred J. Loos Sports Complex.

Venue: Vitruvian Park
City: Addison

2025-09-13 | 6-10p

More Info

Dallas Mavericks African American Heritage Night

[Date tentative] A cultural celebration and Mavericks game in one — recognizing African American heritage on and off the court. Combines sports, culture, fundraising (UNCF & NPHC), and community in a vibrant, themed experience. When: Annual event, most recently held on February 21, 2025

Venue: American Airlines Cen
City: Dallas
Area: Victory Park

2026-02-20 | 7p-11p
